name: Float the Boat!
description:
Float the Boat! is a 2v2 shared-screen arcade game where 2 Teams compete to raise a sunken Shipwreck by tying Balloons to it.

  • Players can collect an Octopus which can be shot at other Players to sink them.
  • Players can also steal Balloons from other Players or their Shipwreck.
  • The first Team to raise their Shipwreck to Sea-Level wins.

Requires 4 controllers to play. (You can still play around with 1, 2 or 3 controllers also, Xbox Controllers preferably)

CONTROLS:
Left Stick - Move
A - Shoot - 1 shot; collect Octopus as Ammo
B - Highlight Self and display Player Number

KeyBoard:
Escape - Pause Menu
